message:
Gaming question for xBox 360:
Can anybody recommend Forza for a racing game?
I found a pre-played copy but I'm not sure if it's a good game. I haven't heard of it.
The alternative is Need for Speed: Underground which is 5-6 years old.

data.message:
Forza is a very sophisticated simulation game, it is the closest you can get to actual driving in racing cars, however this doesn't mean it is fun for all, games like Need For Speed alter the physics rules to make it fun, some of the turns and hits are not realistic at all, but make the game fun.
Forza is a very fun game if you are into Cars, for example if you watch shows like Top Gear you will find Forza speaks the same language.

I've been watching a lot of Top Gear lately, and all the racing made me think I should try to find a racing game.
I'm watching videos and this "rewind" thing is very cool. It's Undo for racing.
http://youtu.be/ym9QCFNAsoA?t=3m
Looks awesome. I like how it can "enhance your driving". But it seems only for xBox One. Damn.
Forza is a Microsoft title, so yeah
NFS underground WOW it's too old man :D
Mohamed El Sayed Enta aih ra2yak fil kalam dah? :D
ana ra2ye en mafesh a7la men el nasr128 pro racing: an authentic egyptian racing game which is available all over egypt :D

honestly, I'm not following up as I should because i'm not a pro gamer no more like I used to, but Forza looks like a good choice if you are into the real driving experience.
the last one I've used and enjoyed, which is a racing game but of another category is DIRT, very real, and very challenging, and you gonna enjoy the real drafts that you can make.
check this gameplay video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fUoIUv79xRQ
Amr Eldib: DIRT has the same cool feature of "rewind" :)
